wikipedia_page.main: Herbert William Smith was a footballer who played for Port Vale in the English Football League between 1925 and 1929.

response: Herbert Smith (22 November 1877 – 6 January 1951) was an English footballer who played in the Football League for Derby County and Stoke. He also competed in the 1908 Summer Olympics, playing at left-back.
